title: DISTANT Recruits TRIVIUM's MATT HEAFY For "Torturous Symphony"
description: From their upcoming album, Tsukuyomi: The Origin.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 9 hours ago
excerpt: From their upcoming album, Tsukuyomi: The Origin.
text: Distant is now streaming their new single "Torturous Symphony" featuring Trivium frontman Matthew K. Heafy. The single comes from Distant's upcoming EP Tsukuyomi: The Origin, an expanded and reimagined version of their debut EP, Tsukuyomi. Tsukuyomi: The Origin features seven brand new tracks alongside six revamped versions of songs and features additional guest spots from Alex Erian of Despised Icon, David Simonich of Signs Of The Swarm, and Travis Worland of Enterprise Earth. Tsukuyomi: The Origin is out November 22. Pre-orders are available here. Distant will hit the road with Fit For An Autopsy, Bodysnatcher, Sylosis, and Judiciary this October. Get your tickets here. Distant is now streaming their new single "Torturous Symphony" featuring Trivium frontman Matthew K. Heafy. The single comes from Distant's upcoming EP Tsukuyomi: The Origin, an expanded and reimagined version of their debut EP, Tsukuyomi.

Tsukuyomi: The Origin features seven brand new tracks alongside six revamped versions of songs and features additional guest spots from Alex Erian of Despised Icon, David Simonich of Signs Of The Swarm, and Travis Worland of Enterprise Earth. Tsukuyomi: The Origin is out November 22. Pre-orders are available here.

Distant will hit the road with Fit For An Autopsy, Bodysnatcher, Sylosis, and Judiciary this October. Get your tickets here.
